message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
I appreciate the offer Alice, but I think this split is more reflective of the declining value over time.  Let's make a deal!
Bob, time is running out.  This offer is fair and still leaves us both with a sizable amount considering the inflation.
